title: The Reaver by Richard Lee Byers (The Sundering #4)
description:
In the 4th book of the multi-author Sundering series launched by New York Times best-selling author R.A. Salvatore, Richard Lee Byers introduces Anton MarivaldiÃ¢â‚¬â€a renowned reaver with an insatiable thirst for bounty and a moral compass that always leads him toward the evil heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s never tried.

Endless, pounding rain afflict the Sea of Fallen Stars and the coastal regions surrounding it. Harvests are failing, travel and trade are disrupted, and civilized forces are giving way to the deluges caused by the storms. In panic and despair, many have turned to the goddess Umberlee, Queen of the Deeps, offering her sacrifices with hope that they will be spared the inevitable reckoning of her perpetual tempest.

Evendur Highcastle, undead pirate captain, risen from the depths to assume the mantle of UmberleeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Chosen, takes advantage of the people's desperation to strike for both spiritual and temporal power in her name.
Vying with Highcastle for the hearts and minds of the people is Stedd Whitehorn, a little boy and the chosen of a god thought lost to time: Lathander, the Morninglord. 

In a time of such upheaval, SteddÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s message of renewal and hope runs in stark contrast to the savage ethos of Highcastle and his waveservants.
When Anton captures the boy in order to collect HighcastleÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s considerable bounty, the reaver is quickly caught in the riptide caused by the sundering of worlds.

Genre: Science Fiction, Fantasy
